title: Washington Monument: Photo Gallery
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia     Photo Gallery              Photo Gallery                    Washington Monument the Early Years   6 Photos  Some early construction shots of the Washington Monument          1930's Restoration Project   5 Photos  Some shots of the 1930's era restoration of the Washington Monument          1960's Restoration Project   6 Photos  Some shots of the 1960's era restoration of the Washington Monument            1990's Restoration Project   6 Photos  Some shots of the 1990's/2000's era restoration of the Washington Monument          Washington Monument Earthquake Damage   9 Photos  Photos of Earthquake Damage sustained during the 5.9 level earthquake in Mineral, VA on August 23, 2011          Earthquake Restoration   15 Photos  Shots of work done during the 2011-2014 restoration of the Washington Monument            September 28th Rappelling Assessment   10 Photos  Contracters from WJE conducting exterior assessment of the Washington Monument September 28, 2011          September 30th Inspection   9 Photos  National Park Service staff inspect the Washington Monument on September 30, 2011          September 30th Operations   24 Photos  Contractors from WJE conducting exterior assessment of the Washington Monument September 30, 2011            Washington Monument Assessment   6 Photos  Photographs of initial assessment and temporary weather mitigation activities          Washington Monument Stones   189 Photos  Commemorative Stones within the Monument
